name: Hold your houses
summary: Have you ever been in a robbery and didn't have weapons to defend yourself  and your house? Well now you can, with hold your houses you have a variety of weapons to use to help you defend yourself, your house and take on those unwanted robbers. The robbers are highly skilled and know how to gain access, they carry weapons such as a pistol, assault rifles and shotguns. Buy your weapons out of cupboards and off walls using points earned. Barricade windows and doors to slow them down, giving you time to make a move.
